name: Flappy Amongus 2
description:
Okay this is awesome game. you fly through pipes on moon, beacause your ship broke. who is the imposter? are you? it doesnt matter this is flappy bird. all art by me programming by me music is symbolism by electro-light which is copyright free song and other is candyland by tobu which is copyright free song. also go play flappy amongus the original by pelaajahacks and mrdowdo because its AWESOMEEEEEEEEEE. 

Sorry for any bugs/glitches/problems/lag/memory leaks. i dont know how to fix them i tried everything and oh yeah its made with love2d
